00024 #ifndef _SERIALIZER_MZML_HPP_
00025 #define _SERIALIZER_MZML_HPP_
00026 
00027 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00028 #include "MSData.hpp"
00029 #include "BinaryDataEncoder.hpp"
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace msdata {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// MSData <-> mzML stream serialization
00037 class PWIZ_API_DECL Serializer_mzML
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     /// Serializer_mzML configuration
00042     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00043     {
00044         /// configuration for binary data encoding in write()
00045         /// note: byteOrder is ignored (mzML always little endian) 
00046         BinaryDataEncoder::Config binaryDataEncoderConfig;
00047 
00048         /// (indexed==true): read/write with <indexedmzML> wrapper
00049         bool indexed;
00050 
00051         Config() : indexed(true) {}
00052     };
00053 
00054     /// constructor
00055     Serializer_mzML(const Config& config = Config());
00056 
00057     /// write MSData object to ostream as mzML
00058     void write(std::ostream& os, const MSData& msd) const;
00059 
00060     /// read in MSData object from an mzML istream 
00061     /// note: istream may be managed by MSData's SpectrumList, to allow for 
00062     /// lazy evaluation of Spectrum data
00063     void read(boost::shared_ptr<std::istream> is, MSData& msd) const;
00064 
00065     private:
00066     class Impl;
00067     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00068     Serializer_mzML(Serializer_mzML&);
00069     Serializer_mzML& operator=(Serializer_mzML&);
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Serializer_mzML::Config& config);
00074 
00075 
00076 } // namespace msdata
00077 } // namespace pwiz

00080 #endif // _SERIALIZER_MZML_HPP_
